  • Class
    Description
    Block
    Represents an individual block in the BrickBreaker game.
    BlockSerializable
    Represents a block within a brick breaker game, designed for serialization.
    GameController
    The GameController class is responsible for managing the game state in the BrickBreaker game.
    GameEngine
    The GameEngine class orchestrates the main game loop, physics computations, and time tracking for a brick breaker game.
    GameEngine.OnAction
     
    Main
    The Main class represents the main entry point for the Brick Game application.
    Score
    The Score class is dedicated to the presentation and animation of score-related elements within the game.
